message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $950000. It's a great deal considering its value to you is $1000000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $850000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $850000 is a bit low considering its value to you. I can meet you halfway at $925000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can improve my offer. How about $875000?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go to $875000, but I'm willing to meet you at $920000. This is my final offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $890000. I believe this is a fair compromise.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $915000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $895000. I believe this is a fair compromise.
